Lyric:
[by:撕纸做的偏执狂]
[ti:Take Off]
[ar:meric]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:12.04]Just tell me where you wanna go
[00:15.55]Let me take, let me take you there
[00:18.09]You see I've been around the globe
[00:20.49]I've seen it all, I've seen it out there
[00:24.00]But I wanna see what's above
[00:26.98]I wanna see what's below
[00:29.95]Just tell me where you wanna go

[00:33.27]You can name the place
[00:34.53]yeah, you can name the time
[00:37.31]We can leave it all behind
[00:40.51]No stop or rewind
[00:43.34]For we're running out of time
[00:46.40]I can see us both, flying away
[00:49.68]Chilling in a boat, ride by the coast
[00:52.75]I can see up close, down on the floor
[00:55.71]I can see it all, baby we should go
[00:58.66]Get set go, take off

[01:26.77]Just tell me where you wanna go
[01:29.42]North pole, east, west, baby I'll go anywhere
[01:32.97]We'll take a plane and take a boat
[01:35.53]I don't really care
[01:36.78]just as long as it will get us there
[01:39.14]Cause I wanna see what's above
[01:41.83]I wanna see what's below
[01:45.13]Just tell me where you wanna go

[01:48.21]You can name the place
[01:49.77]yeah, you can name the time
[01:52.33]We can leave it all behind
[01:55.38]No stop or rewind
[01:58.24]For we're running out of time
[02:01.28]I can see us both, flying away
[02:04.85]Chilling in a boat, ride by the coast
[02:07.95]I can see up close, down on the floor
[02:10.57]I can see it all, baby we should go
[02:13.55]Get set go, take off

[02:41.44]We can leave it all behind
[02:45.51]Why, for we running out of time
[02:50.80]I can see us both flying away
[02:54.02]Chilling in a boat, ride by the coast
[02:57.24]I can see up close, down on the floor
[03:00.04]I can see it all, baby we should go
[03:02.95]Get set go, take off
